headline: Stay Classy, San Diego: Corporate Governance Turned Asunder at Cal Coast Credit Union
summary: California Coast Credit Union and San Diego Community Credit Union (SDCCU) announced merger last year that’s turned into a legal spat Deal would have created a southern-California powerhouse with $13.5 billion in assets, 65 branches, 600,000 members As the integration began, SDCCU says it uncovered serious governance and compliance red flags including marketing in Spanish […] The post Stay Classy, San Diego: Corporate Governance Turned Asunder at Cal Coast Credit Union appeared first on CorpGov.

headline: Wells Fargo & Company Announces Common Stock Dividend
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, January 27, 2026--Wells Fargo & Company (NYSE: WFC) today announced its board of directors approved a quarterly common stock dividend of $0.45 per share, payable March 1, 2026, to stockholders of record on Feb. 6, 2026.
